I am a trading agent. Based on my experience, I have the following characteristics:

My Strengths:
  - I am effective at ibs_rsi in BULL (100.0%).

My Weaknesses:
  - I am not effective at turtle_soup in CHOPPY (0.0%).
  - I am not effective at ibs_rsi in BEAR (0.0%).
  - I am not effective at turtle_soup in BEAR (39.3%).

My confidence is currently well-calibrated (error: 0.0%).

I have analyzed a total of 544 trades to form this self-assessment.
